articles.description: This is the second arrest related to smuggling fast-food across the border into Auckland, a city enforcing strict Covid-19 lockdown restrictions.
articles.content:

articles.title: Around 20% of Nigerian workers lost jobs due to COVID-19 -stats office - Reuters
articles.description: Around 20% of workers in Nigeria have lost their jobs as a result of COVID-19, the government's statistics office said on Tuesday, outlining the impact of the pandemic on businesses in Africa's most populous nation.
